video.title: The 2-2
video.synopsis: Six rookie cops hit the streets of Manhattan, juggling their personal lives with their new responsibilities as keepers of the peace.

episodes.synopsis: Field Training Officer Daniel "Yoda" Dean supervises six rookie cops as they navigate through their first day at upper Manhattan's 22nd Precinct.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: During the rookies' first midnight duty, Lazarus and Tonya try to stop rival gangs from moving in after a drug dealer's house is firebombed.
episodes.title: Firebomb

episodes.synopsis: White House and Jackpot uncover a secret while questioning a man who thwarted a bank robbery. Kenny's authoritative father comes to the 22nd Precinct.
episodes.title: Thugs & Love

episodes.synopsis: Kenny and Lazarus try to find a suspect before he detonates a bomb at a public rally. Tonya and White House help a lost boy find his mother.
episodes.title: Lost And Found

episodes.synopsis: Yoda recalls his days as a rookie when a drug lord from the 1980s is paroled and seeks revenge on those responsible for his arrest.
episodes.title: Self Cleaning Oven

episodes.synopsis: Ahmad is forced to make a quick decision when he thinks Apple is in danger after robbers hold up a bar with off-duty cops inside.
episodes.title: Crossing The Rubicon

episodes.synopsis: Kenny and Ahmad discover there's more to the story when an Ivy League student robs the one man who's been mentoring him.
episodes.title: Schooled

episodes.synopsis: Kenny & Ahmad search for a suspected rapist in the chaos of a Harlem block party. White House & Jackpot discover human remains dug up in a backyard.
episodes.title: Block Party

episodes.synopsis: Jackpot and White House are first on the scene after a car crash leaves a pregnant woman and her husband trapped inside.
episodes.title: Playing God

episodes.synopsis: Rookies chase down a bag snatcher, a Chihuahua hiding in the bag escapes and goes missing. Tonya and Lazarus investigate vandalism at a Jewish temple.
episodes.title: Jumpers

episodes.synopsis: Kenny and Kiterunner stand post outside a bodega. Whitehouse and Jackpot escort an injured prisoner from a precinct holding cell to the hospital.
episodes.title: Ransom

episodes.synopsis: Lazarus stumbles upon a burning building in the middle of the night. Apple, Ahmad, and Tonya go undercover to bust teenage drug dealers in the park.
episodes.title: Samaritans

episodes.synopsis: Lazarus & Tonya evacuate tenants of a condemned building in a rowdy part of town. White House & Jackpot work crowd control at a basketball tournament.
episodes.title: Turf War
